Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 111st overall pick, by Pontiac in 1978...
Injured on 4/21/1982 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 6/14/1983, off Clarence Amburgey (LYN)...
Signed as a free agent by Syracuse on 2/24/1989 to a 4-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
Injured on 7/19/1989 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Won World Championship with Syracuse in 1990...
